attributes.action:
Make  capt. 
Tom Moore a knight
attributes.additional_details: To persuade the Queen to make him a Knight or the government to make him a lord
attributes.background: Capt Tom Moore did 100 laps of his garden raising over 12 million for the NHS at the age of 99. More then any other so called celebrity or footballer. Give him the credit he deserves instead of those who do nothing

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
